items.name: Memeforest
items.info: Enjoy a world full of memes! You are stranded in an island full of memes, your mission is to fight the bad meme boss (the grubhub guy). Game ver: 1.4 release [Under Wo'Oh update]

items.name: Sunat Hospital
items.info: Try to survive in a haunted sunat hospital. Can you survive to 6 am or will the sussy animatronics kill you. Game ver: 1.0 Release [Full Game Release]

items.name: OtnaHome
items.info: An epik home simulator where you can eat apple and work all day. But beware of the debt boss! If you eat too much apple and your money goes under 0 the debt boss will come and you have to fight him! Game ver: 1.5 [The big update]

items.name: Mouse Eater
items.info: Dont get your mouse pointer eaten by the ball! Game ver: 1.0 [release]

items.name: Otna Friends
items.info: A game where you can explore, fight, trade, survive and more with your friends! Game ver: 1.4 [Alpha]

items.name: Arkacraft Island
items.info: Arkacraft Islands Releasing On 12 March 2022! Game ver: 1.0 [release]
